The claim falsely states that Bernie San: health care plan proposes to raise the tax rate to 52% on incomes over $29,000. The expert's verdict confirms that this claim is egregiously false.
The expert: s verdict also mentions that former South Bend Mayor Pete Buttigieg claimed that "taxes will go up on anybody making more than $29,000" under Sanders' tax plan, but Sanders disputed this and stated that any tax increase for low-wage workers would be offset by lower health care costs.
